Articles.Content:
Greetings all. This is going to sound stupid but, is there anywhere else that can cause thrust to show backwards in the game? I know its correct in Unity, I exported it and another part with the same thrustTransform rotation and the other one works fine. Any ideas?

I might have been refrencing the wrong .mu. Any mod is free to delete this.

Edited October 16, 2016 by SpaceMouse
